pages.title: Attracting an Undead Sea
pages.text: $(#734608)To attract the zombies, I must cast an attractive bait across a wide area. Perhaps an $(item)Animated Brain Dispersion Rocket$()$(#734608), created by attaching an $(item)Animated Brain$()$(#734608) to a firework rocket, is one way to do so?.  $()
$(#734608)Fighting off these mobs may be very challenging, but the rewards are well worth the risk. The zombies could be carrying highly expensive glaretorches, or maybe something even better! $()
